sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-parallax
      dark
      src="https://cdn.vuetifyjs.com/images/backgrounds/vbanner.jpg"
      center
      width="1200"
      height="800"
    >
      <v-container class="md-12">
        <v-card class="ma-12">
          <form class="ma-10 mt-10 pl-2">
            <v-text-field
              v-model="name"
              :counter="10"
              label="Name"
              required
              @input="$v.name.$touch()"
              @blur="$v.name.$touch()"
            ></v-text-field>
            <v-text-field
              v-model="email"
              label="E-mail"
              required
              @input="$v.email.$touch()"
              @blur="$v.email.$touch()"
            ></v-text-field>
            <v-select
              v-model="select"
              :items="items"
              label="ออฟฟิต"
              required
              @change="$v.select.$touch()"
              @blur="$v.select.$touch()"
            ></v-select>

            <v-btn class="mr-4 ma-10" @click="submit"> submit </v-btn>
          </form>
        </v-card>
      </v-container>
    </v-parallax>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data: () => ({
    name: "",
    email: "",
    select: null,
    items: ["พนักงานโรงงาน", "ออฟฟิต"],
  }),
};
</script>

<style></style>
